product_name: Earth Bliss Stand Up paddle Board - 10'
long_description: Designed with a keeled nose and tip-to-tail width for exceptional stability and glide, the Bliss Paddle Board has a large, flat padded deck, making it the perfect floating yoga mat.
short_description: Designed with a keeled nose and tip-to-tail width for exceptional stability and glide, the Bliss Paddle Board has a large, flat padded deck, making it the perfect floating yoga mat.
